The description is kind of thin, don't you think?
I've downloaded it and confirmed that it is this product: http://www.gaiam.com/product/media-library/yoga-dvds/yoga-for-beginners/kundalini+yoga+dvd.do
A very good instruction video indeed, feels very genuine.
The only thing thats good about this video is the the quality... the workout itself is complete crap and a waste of time.....
ChmoVSkafandre: that's because it's not a 'workout'

@ChmoVSkafandre
This is definitely not a workout..and should be taken very seriously..
Kundalini yoga is a pure spiritural science that leads to enlightenment and God-Realization under the guidance of a Spiritual Master. The awakening of kundalini means awakening of inner knowledge.-en.wikipedia.org
p.s. Engaging in advance yoga practice without expert oversight could lead to serious consequences..

I agree, this is not a workout.  It's not supposed to be.  Straight from Gaiam's website on basic yoga styles:
Who it's best for: Practitioners embrace Kundalini as a holistic form of yoga that applies to all aspects of life and does not focus exclusively on fitness.

If you want yoga for a workout, try vinyasa/ashtanga, or bikram.  Those require a great deal more fitness.
Thank you, this is a good introduction to Kundalini :)

I couldn't get this to work...
Anyway, the same dvd is here in a compressed form:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4729427/Kundalini_Yoga_AVI

Sory guys, dont wasted your time downloading this video, this is not the true kundalini yoga

If you are an real seeker, search for the book kundalini yoga by Sivananda
